attributes.action: Maintain FREE BANKING and not start charging good bank customers to access their own money!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is one of the few places in the world where current
     accounts are still free.  As the Office of Fair Trading starts
     to crack down on excessive charges for current accounts and
     credit cards there are indications that some banks may
     introduce monthly charges for all. People who incur charges are
     warned beforehand in terms and conditions and should accept the
     fees. Free banking should remain for "good" bank customers. WE
     HAVE NO CHOICE BUT TO HAVE A BANK ACCOUNT. We give the banks
     our money every month and they make massive profits so how can
     they now say that they think its fair that we all pay to get
     access to our own money???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
